src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : I 'm hungry . @ G ( LC , eat ( ) ) [start] LC : I 'm hungry . [MASK] RP : I 'm hungry . [MASK] LC : I 'd like to eat . [MASK] ARI : It 's the most important question of the day . Are you hungry yet ? [MASK] RP : Yes . [MASK] ARI : You can ask my colleague in the room who is responsible for the meals . [MASK] LC : I 'd like to go to the toilet before the consultation . [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . @ AG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [end] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . @ AG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . @ CG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Thank you .
tgt: ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : Thank you . @ CG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : Thank you . LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . @ G ( LP , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . @ AG ( LP , go-to ( lifts ) ) LP : Thank you . @ CG ( LP , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : Thank you . RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . @ AG ( RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . @ CG ( RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : Thank you .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Hello , I 'd like to know where my doctor 's office is ? I have an appointment with her at 3 PM . @ G ( LP , get-info ( doctor ( room ) ) RC : Do you have an appointment at 3 PM ? [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RC : Ah , that 's very good ARI . [MASK] RC : Do we have time for a coffee before we go ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . RC : So where can we get a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : I do n't think ARI heard because you spoke at the same time as him . ARI : Sorry , can you repeat that please ? ARI : Do you need information ? RC : Well , we 'd just like to know where we can get a hot chocolate . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : Ah , yes . [end] ARI : You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . @ AG ( LP+RC , drink ( hot_chocolate ) ) RC : Ah , that 's good , we 'll go there . We have time before the appointment .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : What time is it , please ? @ G ( LC , get-info ( time ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . RP : Is there a reception for people who have an appointment like me ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( reception ) ) [start] ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? RP : I can ask ... RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? [MASK] [end] ARI : No . The cafeteria is open from 11 AM to 3 PM . @ AG ( RP , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) )
tgt: ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . @ AG ( RP , go-to ( reception ) ) RP : Thank you . @ CG ( RP , go-to ( reception ) ) LC : Can we have a coffee ? @ G ( LC+RP , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : You 're welcome . LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? @ G ( LC+RP , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . @ AG ( LC+RP , drink ( coffee ) ) RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? @ G ( RP , get-info ( beverage ( coffee ( cost ) ) ) ) ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? RP : I can ask ... RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? @ G ( RP , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Yes , I do . I 'd like to know where the cafeteria is , um or , I do n't know , a restaurant here in the hospital ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Um , can you repeat that please ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RP : I 'm hard of hearing and the sound is a little low , can you repeat that please ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : So , another question ... LC : Um , hello . Do you know where the toilets are ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . @ AG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) LC : Thank you . @ CG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )
